import React, { useState } from 'react'; import HowToPlaySubtitle from './HowToPlaySubtitle.js'; import { MemberCard } from '../../Footer/MemberCard.js'; import { EventGoalCard } from '../../Footer/EventGoalCard.js'; import { ChevronDown, Users, ArrowRight } from 'react-feather'; import '../../../css/about.css'; const Roleplay = (props) => { let cardStyle = { width:"70px", height:"50px", fontSize:"2px", } const [showSteps, setShowSteps] = useState(false); const toggleSteps = ()=> { setShowSteps(!showSteps); } return (

Game {(!showSteps) ? "Setup" : "Rules"}

Show Game {(showSteps) ? "Setup" : "Rules"}

Step 1

Decide the 6 players who will be Members of the House. The rest will be playing as Commentators.

If you don't have enough players, each Member also plays as a Commentator.

Step 2 - Members

Players are assigned a random Member Card, a Goal Card, and receive two Signal Tokens.

Your goal is to complete your Goal Card or find love and leave the house.

Step 2 - Commentators

Players are assigned a random Commentator Card and receive a Signal Token.

Your goal is to commentate on what the Members are doing and crack jokes.

Step 1

All new Members must introduce themselves.

If you don't have enough players, each Member also plays as a Commentator.

Show Game{(showSteps) ? "Setup" : "Rules"}
); } export default Roleplay;
